period: Gather data, prepare the BIR Form, and draft the payment request (e.g., check voucher).
Senior Finance Manager (SFM) reviews and approves the report data for accuracy and compliance. (File Request is submitted to SFM.)
The approved report and payment request are routed. Finance Director (FD) reviews and approves the release of funds for remittance.
The approved form is Filed and the payment is Remitted (either electronically or over the counter).
